name: Disability Rights
description: The Disability Rights Program (DRP) advances the civil rights of people with disabilities in employment, education, and public services. We provide free resources, trainings, and more to educate people with disabilities about their rights to reasonable accommodations at work, equal access to public facilities, and equity at public schools.
